mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, west front
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Providence Journal-Bulletin
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white horizontal image of Mansion's west front. Includes both colonnades as well as part of the servants' hall and kitchen. People can be seen in front of the Mansion. The Providence Journal's stamp of their rights statement appears on the reverse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:rights: Courtesy of the Providence Journal. This photograph may not be used elsewhere or reproduced without authorization of the Providence Journal Company.
